abilities.name: Fire Immunity
abilities.effect: You can't attach Fire Energy cards from your hand to Moltres.

attacks.name: Collect Fire
attacks.effect: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Moltres.

attacks.name: Burning Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Energy card attached to Moltres.
